h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone
content: Once all six Palestones are down, there’s nothing left that the Mother of Stone can do, so keep smacking it until the boss breaks apart. You’ll be awarded the Stone Essence Key Item, as well as some Stone Spirits and Yaoguai Cores.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Man-in-Stone_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Man-in-Stone Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Man-in-Stone' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss - Mother of Stone'.
The content is as follows:
Once all six Palestones are down, there’s nothing left that the Mother of Stone can do, so keep smacking it until the boss breaks apart. You’ll be awarded the Stone Essence Key Item, as well as some Stone Spirits and Yaoguai Cores.
